Articles.Content: The link on the KSPTV calendar thread is broken. It goes to twitch.com rather than twitch.tv [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84562-KSP-TV-Programming-Schedule](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84562-KSP-TV-Programming-Schedule)
It's going to this: [https://twitch.com/ksptv/](https://twitch.com/ksptv/) where firefox pops up a warning about untrusted connection.
Fixed, thanks for noticing and reporting it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
